Description: Foot sherd (convex outer face) of Attic black-glazed pottery kylix; glazed black on top and underside (streaky on exterior); reserved: outer face of foot and resting surface; incised inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 517)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1475)
